title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST/CLI API and Docker images for macOS/Linux; lets you pull, run, and chat with quantized Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API; pip-installable wrapper that exposes chat, generate, embed, pull, and list endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; provides promise-based wrappers for chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; supports multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & async APIs, streaming, and model management utilities.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter: uses Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB to chat with local PDFs or text files.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: Official Nvidia GPU setup docs and helper scripts for running Ollama with CUDA acceleration.

title: ollama-apple-silicon
summary: Native Apple Silicon build and Metal Performance Shaders integration for M1/M2 Macs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration that exposes Ollama as a Generator and Embedder in deepset Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official compose file bundling Ollama with Open-WebUI and optional GPU runtime for quick local stacks.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama; idiomatic structs and streaming support for chat and generate endpoints.
